title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a frontend developer with experience in React and Tailwind CSS. Responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features, Build reusable code and libraries for future use, Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. Requirements: Proven experience as a Frontend Developer, Experience with React and Tailwind CSS, Understanding of web markup, including HTML5 and CSS3.

title: Backend Developer
description: Join our backend team to work on scalable web applications using Node.js. Responsibilities: Develop and maintain server-side applications, Collaborate with front-end developers, Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability. Requirements: Proven experience as a Backend Developer, In-depth understanding of Node.js, Knowledge of database systems.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a full stack developer proficient in React and Node.js. Responsibilities: Work across the full stack, Build and maintain web applications, Collaborate with designers and other developers. Requirements: Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer, Proficiency in React and Node.js, Strong problem-solving skills.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are seeking a talented UI/UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. Responsibilities: Gather and evaluate user requirements, Illustrate design ideas using storyboards and process flows, Design graphic user interface elements. Requirements: Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer, Proficiency in design software like Figma and Sketch, Portfolio of design projects.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure. Responsibilities: Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines, Monitor and manage cloud infrastructure, Collaborate with development teams to streamline processes. Requirements: Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer, Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes, Strong scripting skills.

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager to oversee our e-commerce platform. Responsibilities: Define product vision and strategy, Collaborate with cross-functional teams, Manage product lifecycle from ideation to launch. Requirements: Proven experience as a Product Manager, Experience with project management tools like JIRA and Confluence, Strong analytical skills.

title: Marketing Specialist
description: We are seeking a Marketing Specialist with experience in social media and digital campaigns. Responsibilities: Develop marketing strategies, Manage social media accounts, Analyze marketing data. Requirements: Proven experience as a Marketing Specialist, Knowledge of digital marketing tools, Excellent communication skills.

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team and analyze large data sets. Responsibilities: Collect and analyze data, Develop predictive models, Communicate findings to stakeholders. Requirements: Proven experience as a Data Scientist, Knowledge of statistical techniques, Experience with Python and R.

title: Technical Writer
description: We need a Technical Writer to create and manage technical documentation. Responsibilities: Write technical documents, Collaborate with developers, Ensure accuracy and clarity. Requirements: Proven experience as a Technical Writer, Excellent writing skills, Technical background preferred.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description: We are hiring a Customer Support Specialist to assist our customers. Responsibilities: Respond to customer inquiries, Troubleshoot issues, Provide excellent customer service. Requirements: Proven experience in customer support, Excellent communication skills, Ability to multitask.
